divs: sighting detailsmy wife took these photos in knoxville, tn driving back from our daughters gymnastics class. she said the object hovered in the air glowing a red\orange hue then turned a dark grey color and shot up in the sky disappearing into the clouds. she first noticed the object because it seemed of place. the sky was a blueish\grey hue and the object stood out because of its bright and vibrant colors. when i first noticed the object i was unsure what it was. the object eventually faded into the sky and clouds and was no longer visible.
Summary: My wife took these photos in Knoxville, TN driving back from our daughters gymnastics class. She said the object hovered in the air glowing a red/orange hue then turned a dark grey color and shot up in the sky disappearing into the clouds.
trends: There have been 50 other sightings in Knoxville
